ArtigosProjetos

Webmtogif

Convert your webm files into gif format

Requirements:

  • bash
  • FFmpeg

Instalation:

Move the script to your /usr/local/bin/ directory.

How to use:

webmtogif ex: $ webtogif video.webm

Colorpick

A GUI color picker to use outside the terminal.

Requirements:

  • bash
  • yad
  • xclip

Instalation:

move the script file to your /usr/local/bin directory.

How to use:

just type colorpick from the commandline. Once the color is picked, click on the "ok" button. The color hex reference will the automaticaly transfered to the clipboard.

Sendmail

A commandline tool to send emails directly from the terminal.

Requirements:

  • bash
  • Curl

Instalation:

give execution permission with chmod +x sendmail and then just just run the script $ ./sendmail

How to use:

The email must be written inside of a file called mail.txt within the same directory as the script is with the following syntax.

From: "User Name"
To: "John Smith"
Subject: This is a test message

Your message goes here.
And it can be written with multiple lines.
